differences.justification: The protocol annotation is not expected to be used by anyone outside of the protocol, so a new attribute will have no impact
Ignore addition of the builder attribute, as it won't have any impact on previous usage of the interfaces
The retention policy for the annotation was changed to allow reflection usage at runtime; should have no impact on actual expected usage
The protocol generation was changed to inject marker annotations on the generated types, but this should have no impact on actual usage of these types
Generated builders are now annotated with a marker which is used for reflection; this only adds information but does not change semantics
Generated types are now annotated with a marker which is used for reflection; this only adds information but does not change semantics
